abilities.name: Faithful Flock
abilities.rule: While this unit is leading a unit and contains a **CULT DEMAGOGUE** model, models in that unit have a 5+ invulnerable save.

abilities.name: Dark Ritual
abilities.rule: Once per battle, in your Command phase, if this unit contains a **CULT DEMAGOGUE** model, it can use this ability. If it does, until the end of the turn, this unit can declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced and each time a model in this unit makes an attack, add 1 to the Hit roll and add 1 to the Wound roll.
